markdownRemark.html: The birth place of two Roman Emperors, Trajan and Hadrian, this place is still being excavated. It resembles Pompei but on a smaller scale. The amphitheater is really impressive. Of course for Game of Thrones fans, it is where they shot the dragon pit scenes.

frontmatter.title: Italica
frontmatter.description: Italica - The birth place of two Roman Emperors, Trajan and Hadrian, this place is still being excavated. It resembles Pompei but on a smaller scale. The amphitheater is really impressive. Of course for Game of Thrones fans, it is where they shot the dragon pit scenes.
frontmatter.price: Free for EU citizens, 1.50 euro for other countries
